data.text: Special events planned at UNHQ all week in remembrance of victims of slavery & the transatlantic slave trade. Details: http://t.co/ykljuwdL
@BartekLech Looks great! Thanks!
Are you 18-29 yrs & struggling to find #work? @ILOnews has launched a video contest to give #youth a voice. http://t.co/xbf90n6t
"War violates every right a child has." -- @IshmaelBeah, UNICEF advocate & author. Watch this: http://t.co/LBwn9dVo
Monday in Seoul: 50+ heads of state & intl orgs discuss nuclear security. Details from @IAEAorg http://t.co/ZkLlBmmW #NSS #NSS2012
Ban Ki-moon is in home country of Rep of Korea. Nuclear security & more are on his agenda. Details: http://t.co/ybUJnOdY #NSS #NSS2012 #ROK
@BevinKurian You're welcome to contact your member state with your ideas/suggestions.

@BevinKurian You are welcome to make suggestions for UN resolutions to your Member State: http://t.co/7lyKRwl5
@LeoAliShahriari "Honouring" is the correct spelling according to the UN Editorial Style Manual.
Honouring the heroes, resisters & survivors -- special series on the transatlantic slave trade from @UN_Radio: http://t.co/0wU9q5IM
@diegomoreno2109 Find out about UN careers here: http://t.co/W1FwCbth.
Ban Ki-moon: "60 years of @UNpeacekeeping have cost less than 6 weeks of current global military spending" http://t.co/1HNSRvPS
Why do you want your country to be #tobacco free? Don't forget to tell @WHO which country you live in. #UseYourPower
@graceyness_12 Thanks for the support. Follow @WFP for more in fighting hunger.
@jmacfear Thank you!

@Dianne93101 No, the UN is an intergovernmental organization. Thanks for your interest!

@Colcestrian Thanks for your support!
@iMohnad No, you'd have to separately make arrangements to get to New York City. No special ID is required for public areas at UNHQ.
Visiting NYC? Take your picture with the new @UN_Rioplus20 #FutureWeWant banner outside UNHQ & upload it here! http://t.co/JjkicsKa
Watch @UNDP Goodwill Ambassador Iker Casillas of @RealMadrid in the #LendYourLeg campaign http://t.co/TfM1YQXB via @mineaction
Travel to Greenland in this @ctbto_alerts video to see work being done to #CloseTheDoorOnNuclearTesting: http://t.co/c6rWdSFn
Sunday is the International Day of Solidarity with Detained and Missing UN Staff Members http://t.co/XRoKukoO
@ScottG305 Most UN funding comes from member states. Individual funds/programme soperate & fundraise separately. Thanks for your support!
@MariKalabakas Contact unreference@un.org for advice.
@iMohnad Sure, see: http://t.co/bGpl99eA
@ScottG305 Yes, it was used for Haiti relief & also Japan, see: http://t.co/iFNzTgLK. Info varies by which country the donor lives in.
#TB kills children every day, but we can prevent it with a 3-cent-a day pill: http://t.co/AhZVh3c7 #WorldTBDay #inmylifetime
Sunday: Intl Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery & the Transatlantic Slave Trade. Details: http://t.co/ykljuwdL

Childhood #tuberculosis remains a hidden epidemic in most countries http://t.co/JcYpc1Nn #WorldTBDay via @WHO

You can be part of #WorldTBDay campaign! Go to http://t.co/JgbDN3bL to create your own personal poster. #inmylifetime

In case you missed it, this week an orchid was named after Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon in Singapore. Photo: http://t.co/XjyQ0Aut
Kids are getting sick and dying of #TB every day. But the world hasn't paid attention. Will you? More at http://t.co/AhZVh3c7 #WorldTBDay
@denishamelody We'll share your comment with our @UNDESA colleagues. Thanks for your interest!
Syria: #HumanRights Council demands end to violence & widespread abuses. How did your country vote? Find out here: http://t.co/hRtacaWp
What are YOU saying about the #FutureWeWant? Take a look at this week's highlights from the global conversation: http://t.co/hWOQFyRk
@ImDonHarp Wow, we're glad to hear from such a fan!
What will you buy with $25 on #WorldTBDay? A couple of pizzas or a life-saving #TB test for children in Africa? Donate: http://t.co/3Pejch9g
#HornofAfrica: @FAOnews appeals for $50 million to cover funding gap for priority agricultural & pastoral activities http://t.co/DFaPYCeO
350,000+ women die during pregnancy & childbirth every year but many of these deaths could be prevented http://t.co/hoxfyFfo #SupplyLife

Do you to stop TB in your lifetime? Go to http://t.co/JgbDN3bL to tell the world with your own #WorldTBDay poster.
This week in Mali, @WFP started an emergency food assistance operation for people displaced by conflict http://t.co/cSSxHb2Z #sahel
#HumanRights Council urges #SriLanka to take credible steps to ensure accountability for alleged war crimes http://t.co/Jk03ndkU
Did you know a football field of #forest is lost every 2 seconds? http://t.co/NM7JI2r6. This is not the #FutureWeWant -- via @worldbank
Ban Ki-moon: Social injustice & environmental risks need to be tackled together http://t.co/9hE6Qlkr #futurewewant #ghdf
